Summary: look like two small discs traveling in formation side by side but I believe it to be one large craft
divs: Sighting Details The object or objects were 4inches apart at arms length traveling exactly same speed from the south going slightly N.E. only one of the lights grew bright and in size to a dime at arms length. it remained extremely bright white for 8 or 9 secs then slowly receded to the original light first noticed. that when I believed it was not as high up nearly as I thought. nothing else changed about it and it kept going till out of sight. exactly 12 mins later a helicopter coming from the west traveling as fast as possible followed after till I lost sight.
